ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: Unless they changed it..?  It s been paladin only since beta where it was a two-handed weapon but has been supposedly changed to 1-handed for the release.  In
ygData.messageBody:
Unless they changed it..? It's been paladin only since beta where it was a two-handed weapon but has been supposedly changed to 1-handed for the release. In beta, its stats were something along the lines of 35 atk/50 delay or something of the like. A very cool picture can be found at.. http://gameznet.com/eq/sceenshots/aradune.JPG I dont know if it will be only 1 per server, I doubt it will though.
-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Wooldirdge <mike@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, June 27, 1999 11:57 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Fiery Avenger


The Fiery Avenger is done through a quest which is some way will include the Great Red Dragon in SOL B. Also it is not a Paladin only weapon unless they changed it recently. There is no way they would allow only 1 person on each server to have one because that would severely piss off the people who don't play every day.
